As the number of such crimes increase, I called on the DOJ to take action to deter & investigate violence against groups and individuals who defend the sanctity of life. https://t.co/o7u6ENXyHM

This morning, I joined @SenatorTester, @JohnBoozman, @MartinHeinrich, veterans and advocates to urge our Senate colleagues to support the SFC Heath Robinson Act. https://t.co/jyXsjLjitf
